Question
========
  
Which of the following actions decreases the probability of making a Type II error?
  
  
Answerlist
----------
* Decreasing the significance level from 0.05 to 0.01.
* Increasing the sample size.
* Lowering the intensity of the intervention.
* Testing multiple hypotheses.

Solution
========
  
Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
